## Description

<!-- Brief description of the changes -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Schema change (new/modified event or context schema)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would break existing implementations)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] New adapter

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My changes follow the project's code style (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] All JSON schemas are valid (`npm run validate:schemas`)
- [ ] TypeScript types regenerated if schemas changed (`npm run generate:types`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed

## Schema Impact

<!-- If this PR changes schemas, describe the impact -->

- [ ] No schema changes
- [ ] New schema(s) added
- [ ] Existing schema(s) modified (backward compatible)
- [ ] Breaking schema change (requires RFC)
